description:
Daphne`s goal was to capture Natsu, and use him to power her the artificial dragon she created through long years of research, the Dragonoid! The Dragonoid sucks out Natsu`s Dragon Slayer magic, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`amitié est plus forte que la mort
友は屍[しかばね]を越えて
